location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 132: Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Commodore George Robinson, Commander of the Persian Gulf Squadron, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter to Commodore George Robinson, Commander of the Persian Gulf Squadron, Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, attaches an extract from a despatch, dated 13 April 1853, which was received from William Taylour Thomson, Her Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires at Tehran. The extract echoes Kemball's appreciation of Robinson's judgement in inflicting fines upon the chiefs of the Persian slaving ports.
